bike.description: Reynolds 520 double-butted chromoly main tubes featuring, SST tubing diameters, sloping top tube frame design, double-tapered cromo stays, forged dropouts with single eyelets

components.description: Jamis Road carbon composite with forged alloy dropouts with single eyelet
Alex Race24 rims with CSW sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Sora RD-3500GS rear and Sora FD-3503 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
Shimano Sora ST-3500 Dual Control STI,27-Speed
Touring platform style, full alloy with toe clips
Tektro R317 long reach dual-pivot calipers with adjustable pads and Shimano Sora ST-3500 STI brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 105mm (54/56), 115mm (58/61). ATS shim length 80mm
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 300mm with cromo seat pin
Jamis Touring Sport with pressure relief cut-out and satin steel rails
